top_repos.name: claude-code
top_repos.description: Claude Code is an agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster by executing routine tasks, explaining complex code, and handling git workflows - all through natural language commands.

top_repos.name: claude-cookbooks
top_repos.description: A collection of notebooks/recipes showcasing some fun and effective ways of using Claude.
